# Gifts in the Age of Empire

Gifts in the Age of Empire: Ottoman-Safavid Cultural Exchange, 1500â€“1639 is a non-fiction book written by Sinem Arcak Casale about the role of material gifts between Safavid Iran and the Ottoman Empire. It was published in 2023 by the University of Chicago Press.
